thread.title: Modern, chic and comfortable hotel to stay!
thread.title_full: Modern, chic and comfortable hotel to stay! - Review of The Westbridge Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: minli3649
title: Modern, chic and comfortable hotel to stay!
text: Very comfortable room, quiet and clean. Close to Stratford tube and railway station. A Handy smartphone provided with unlimited mobile internet during my stay in London, free of charge. A really great experience living here!
